name: Webwurlds
description: Jess Johnson and Simon Ward's work is inspired by science fiction and fantasy. Johnson's hand-drawn illustrations are heavily detailed with geometric patterns and incorporate anthropomorphic characters amongst architectural environments in immersive other worlds.

key_work.title: Webwurld
key_work.credit_line:
Jess Johnson and Simon Ward

Single-channel video work

ACMI Collection
key_work.headline_credit: Aotearoa / New Zealand and United States, 2017
key_work.material_description: Soundtrack by Andrew Clarke. video, colour and audio
key_work.brief_description: Webwurld appears like fragments of a dream, mesmerising its viewers with a cosmic, otherworldly dimension that seems to stretch out in every direction.

constellations_primary.name: Webwurlds
constellations_primary.description: Jess Johnson and Simon Ward's work is inspired by science fiction and fantasy. Johnson's hand-drawn illustrations are heavily detailed with geometric patterns and incorporate anthropomorphic characters amongst architectural environments in immersive other worlds.

constellations_other.name: Speculative futures, sci-fi worlds and environmental disaster
constellations_other.description: Deborah Kelly's The Gods of Tiny Things explores extinction and the climate crisis, the scars of colonialism, and the political shift to the right around the world through collage and imagined futures, much like these sci-fi, animated and computer-generated artworks.

constellations_other.name: From queer period romances to surrealistic worlds
constellations_other.description: Explore the interconnections between queer period dramas, through to sci-fi and surrealistic worlds.

links.description: Co-directed by Simon Ward, Aroha Bridge explores the multicultural melting pot of New Zealand through the characters of the Hook family. The hand-drawn animated series navigates the complex and hilarious circumstances growing up in a bicultural community.

end.title: Labyrinth
end.creator_credit: Eric Rattray, Henson Organisation, Lucasfilm Ltd. and Elliot Scott
end.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1986
end.brief_description: When teen Sarah is forced to babysit Toby, her baby stepbrother, she summons Jareth the Goblin King to take him away. When he is actually kidnapped, Sarah is given just thirteen hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue him.

constellations_other.name: Blizzard, Bowie and the Bonets
constellations_other.description: Overwatch is the beginning of some surprising connections in this Constellation that explores videogame movies, cartoons, and music docos and shows.

constellations_other.name: Webwurlds
constellations_other.description: Jess Johnson and Simon Ward's work is inspired by science fiction and fantasy. Johnson's hand-drawn illustrations are heavily detailed with geometric patterns and incorporate anthropomorphic characters amongst architectural environments in immersive other worlds.

links.description: Jim Henson’s Labyrinth, based on conceptual designs by fantasy illustrator Brian Froud, is set in a fantastical world of goblins, castles and all kinds of strange creatures. Starring David Bowie as the nefarious king, Henson modeled the film’s final sequence after Escher’s staircases.

start.title: Labyrinth
start.creator_credit: Eric Rattray, Henson Organisation, Lucasfilm Ltd. and Elliot Scott
start.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1986

end.title: Metropolis
end.brief_description: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city’s mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

constellations_other.name: Little, big worlds
constellations_other.description: Wes Anderson's stop-motion animation film draws on tried-and-true techniques that, despite the rise of computer-generated imagery, still inspire filmmakers and game-makers.

constellations_other.name: Arcades and AI
constellations_other.description: Using the godfather of computing, Alan Turing, as a starting point, this Constellation traces the evolution of AI representation on-screen and the way female androids, robots and holograms have been hyper sexualised.

constellations_other.name: Webwurlds
constellations_other.description: Jess Johnson and Simon Ward's work is inspired by science fiction and fantasy. Johnson's hand-drawn illustrations are heavily detailed with geometric patterns and incorporate anthropomorphic characters amongst architectural environments in immersive other worlds.

constellations_other.name: One of the first auteurs
constellations_other.description: A progenitor of modern film genres such as sci-fi, psychological thriller and serial killer films decades before such terms were coined, Austrian-born director Fritz Lang also enjoyed the occasional on-screen meta-moment.

links.description: Set in a city where the wealthy live above and underground workers tirelessly power the city above, Metropolis is visually breathtaking. Detailed backdrops create an immersive futuristic environment, reinforced by the synchronized mechanical movements of thousands of extras to create the dystopia.

end.title: Dune II: The Building of a Dynasty
end.brief_description: Dune II is often considered the first mainstream modern real-time strategy game and established many conventions of the genre. Even though set in Frank Herbert’s famous Dune universe, the game is only loosely connected to the book’s plot.

constellations_other.name: Webwurlds
constellations_other.description: Jess Johnson and Simon Ward's work is inspired by science fiction and fantasy. Johnson's hand-drawn illustrations are heavily detailed with geometric patterns and incorporate anthropomorphic characters amongst architectural environments in immersive other worlds.

links.description: Based on Frank Herbert’s novel Dune, Dune II is one of the most influential real-time strategy games, establishing the format. Dune II draws on Herbet’s complex world-building, depicting the feuding families once again at war over the precious spice melange on the planet Arrakis.

start.title: Dune II: The Building of a Dynasty

end.title: Akira
end.creator_credit: Katsuhiro Otomo, Haruyo Kanesaku, Hiroe Tsukamoto, Ryohei Suzuki, Shunzo Kato, Yoshimasa Mizuo, Yutaka Maseba, Akira Committee Company Ltd., Bandai Entertainment Inc., Kodansha, MBS, Studio Aoi, Studio Fuga, Sumitomo Corporation, TMS Entertainment, TOHO, Hiroshi Ohno, Kazuo Ebisawa, Koji Ono, Yuji Ikehata and Izo Hashimoto
end.brief_description: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath that only two teenagers and a group of psychics can stop.

constellations_other.name: Webwurlds
constellations_other.description: Jess Johnson and Simon Ward's work is inspired by science fiction and fantasy. Johnson's hand-drawn illustrations are heavily detailed with geometric patterns and incorporate anthropomorphic characters amongst architectural environments in immersive other worlds.

links.description: Admired for exceptional visuals, Akira is set in the futuristic cyberpunk Neo-Tokyo where similarly to the plot of Dune, humans have acquired telekinetic abilities. Much of the character and setting designs were adapted from the original manga comic with the film utilising hand-drawn cel-animation.

constellations_other.name: Webwurlds
constellations_other.description: Jess Johnson and Simon Ward's work is inspired by science fiction and fantasy. Johnson's hand-drawn illustrations are heavily detailed with geometric patterns and incorporate anthropomorphic characters amongst architectural environments in immersive other worlds.

end.title: Rick and Morty
end.creator_credit: Albro Lundy IV, Anne Lane, J. Michael Mendel, Lee Harting, Nick Rutherford, Steve Levy, Sydney Ryan, Green Portal Productions, Harmonius Claptrap, Justin Roiland's Solo Vanity Card Productions, Starburns Industries and Williams Street
end.brief_description: Rick is a mentally-unbalanced but scientifically gifted old man who has recently reconnected with his family. He spends most of his time involving his young grandson Morty in dangerous, outlandish adventures throughout space and alternate universes. Compounded with Morty’s already unstable family life, these events cause Morty much distress at home and school.

constellations_other.name: From the outside looking in
constellations_other.description: In Marshmallow Laser Feast's Evolver, we journey inside the human body, inhaled through the lungs and swept throughout the cells with breath. Across screen culture, many narratives similarly explore what's under our skin.

constellations_other.name: Webwurlds
constellations_other.description: Jess Johnson and Simon Ward's work is inspired by science fiction and fantasy. Johnson's hand-drawn illustrations are heavily detailed with geometric patterns and incorporate anthropomorphic characters amongst architectural environments in immersive other worlds.

links.description: Originating from an animated parody of Back to the Future, Rick and Morty is a sci-fi sitcom that follows an eccentric mad scientist Rick and his naïve yet kindly grandson Morty. Set across a multiverse, characters frequently travel between dimensions meeting alternate versions of themselves.
